000721.SZ.summary: Xi'an Catering Co., Ltd. operates and manages restaurants and hotels. The company operates regular chain restaurants, hotels, dumpling restaurants, roast duck restaurants, and others, which provide catering services, food delivery services, and room services. It is also involved in the provision of cooking art training services; and hot spring recuperation and enterprise investment consulting businesses. The company operates 15 branches and 50 regular chain shops in Xi'an, Shaanxi province. Xi'an Catering Co., Ltd. is based in Xi'an, China.

002186.SZ.summary: China Quanjude (Group) Co., Ltd. operates Chinese restaurants under the Quanjude and Mingzhu brand name in China. The company produces and sells roast duck and various cooked food products; lotus leaf cakes, sweet noodles, and other roast duck accessories; and mooncakes, dumplings, and Yuanxiao products under the Quanjude and Fangshan brand name. It also offers pasta and the courtesan brand palace cakes; and chili sauce under the Sichuan hotel brand. In addition, the company provides Fortress Garden pasta food products. Further, it offers Chinese food catering services. China Quanjude (Group) Co., Ltd. was founded in 1864 and is based in Beijing, China.

0520.HK.long_name: Xiabuxiabu Catering Management (China) Holdings Co., Ltd.
0520.HK.summary: Xiabuxiabu Catering Management (China) Holdings Co., Ltd., an investment holding company, operates Chinese hotpot restaurants in the People's Republic of China. As of December 31, 2020, the company owned and operated 1,061 restaurants under the Xiabuxiabu brand name in 130 cities in approximately 24 provinces and three centrally administered municipalities; and 140 restaurants under the Coucou brand name in Beijing, Tianjin, Shanghai, and Hong Kong. It also offers catering services; and sells condiment products and other goods. In addition, the company engages in the slaughtering, processing, cold storage, and sale of raw materials. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Beijing, the People's Republic of China. Xiabuxiabu Catering Management (China) Holdings Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Ying Qi Investments Limited.

0XI.F.long_name: Xiabuxiabu Catering Management (China) Holdings Co., Ltd.
0XI.F.summary: Xiabuxiabu Catering Management (China) Holdings Co., Ltd., an investment holding company, operates Chinese hotpot restaurants in the People's Republic of China. 3666.HK.long_name: TANSH Global Food Group Co., Ltd
3666.HK.summary: TANSH Global Food Group Co., Ltd, an investment holding company, operates a chain of restaurants in Mainland China and Hong Kong. The company operates 55 Shanghai Min restaurants, 2 Maison DeL'Hui restaurants, 22 the dining room restaurants, 1 Oreno restaurant, 1 Wolfgang Puck restaurants, 1 COCO2NUTS, 3 AYO MAYA, and 1 DOUTOR cafÃ©. It is also involved in the management of restaurants; provision of management services; franchise operation; sale of software; and provision of IT technology services. The company was formerly known as Xiao Nan Guo Restaurants Holdings Limited and changed its name to TANSH Global Food Group Co., Ltd in June 2017. TANSH Global Food Group Co., Ltd was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Shanghai, the People's Republic of China.

600721.SS.summary: Xinjiang Baihuacun Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the coal selecting and mining, and coal chemical businesses in China and internationally. It provides coal, coke, and other coal chemical products, including metallurgical coke, gas coal coke, coal tar, crude benzene, composite ammonia, urea, and other products. The company was founded in 1959 and is based in Urumqi, China.

6862.HK.summary: Haidilao International Holding Ltd., an investment holding company, engages in the restaurant chain operation and delivery businesses. It operates a Haidilao branded Chinese cuisine restaurant that focuses on hot pot cuisine. The company is also involved in the sale of condiment products and food ingredients; logistics and wholesale trade activities; management consultation; financial management; and food research and development, and trading businesses. As of December 31, 2020, it owned and operated 1,298 restaurants, including 1,205 restaurants in Mainland China, as well as 93 restaurants in Hong Kong, Macao, Taiwan, Singapore, Vietnam, Malaysia, Indonesia, South Korea, Japan, the United Kingdom, the United States, Canada, and Australia. Haidilao International Holding Ltd. was incorporated in 2015 and is headquartered in Beijing, the People's Republic of China.

8HI.F.summary: Haidilao International Holding Ltd., an investment holding company, engages in the restaurant chain operation and delivery businesses. It operates a Haidilao branded Chinese cuisine restaurant that focuses on hot pot cuisine. The company is also involved in the sale of condiment products and food ingredients; logistics and wholesale trade activities; management consultation; financial management; and food research and development, and trading businesses. As of December 31, 2020, it owned and operated 1,298 restaurants, including 1,205 restaurants in Mainland China, as well as 93 restaurants in Hong Kong, Macao, Taiwan, Singapore, Vietnam, Malaysia, Indonesia, South Korea, Japan, the United Kingdom, the United States, Canada, and Australia. Haidilao International Holding Ltd. was incorporated in 2015 and is headquartered in Beijing, the People's Republic of China.

9922.HK.summary: Jiumaojiu International Holdings Limited operates as a Chinese cuisine restaurant brand manager and operator in the People's Republic of China. As of December 31, 2020, it operated 349 restaurants and managed 32 franchised restaurants covering 60 cities in 21 provinces and four municipalities in the People's Republic of China under the Jiu Mao Jiu, Tai Er, Double Eggs, Song, and Uncle Chef brands. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Guangzhou, the People's Republic of China.

DBUB.summary: DBUB Group Inc. does not have significant business. The company intends to franchise and operate restaurants, and catering facilities. The company was formerly known as Yosen Group, Inc. and changed its name to DBUB Group Inc. in October 2018. DBUB Group Inc. was founded in 1998 and is based in Shanghai, China.

HDALF.summary: Haidilao International Holding Ltd., an investment holding company, engages in the restaurant chain operation and delivery businesses. It operates a Haidilao branded Chinese cuisine restaurant that focuses on hot pot cuisine. The company is also involved in the sale of condiment products and food ingredients; logistics and wholesale trade activities; management consultation; financial management; and food research and development, and trading businesses. As of December 31, 2020, it owned and operated 1,298 restaurants, including 1,205 restaurants in Mainland China, as well as 93 restaurants in Hong Kong, Macao, Taiwan, Singapore, Vietnam, Malaysia, Indonesia, South Korea, Japan, the United Kingdom, the United States, Canada, and Australia. Haidilao International Holding Ltd. was incorporated in 2015 and is headquartered in Beijing, the People's Republic of China.

LKNCY.summary: Luckin Coffee Inc. engages in the retail sale of freshly brewed drinks, and pre-made food and beverage items in the People's Republic of China. It offers freshly brewed drinks, including freshly brewed coffee and non-coffee drinks; and food and beverage items, such as light meals. The company operates pick-up stores, relax stores, and delivery kitchens under the Luckin brand, as well as Luckin mobile app, Weixin mini-program, and other third-party platforms that cover the customer purchase process. As of March 31, 2019, it operated 2,370 stores, including 2,163 pick-up stores, 109 relax stores, and 98 delivery kitchens in 28 cities in the People's Republic of China. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in Xiamen, the People's Republic of China.

MYT.summary: Urban Tea, Inc. engages in the specialty tea product distribution and retail business in the People's Republic of China. The company offers tea-based beverages, including fresh milk tea, fruit tea, milk cap tea, etc.; light meals comprising salads, sandwiches, pasta, steak, burritos, and other healthy options; and pastries consisting of fresh baked bread, fresh baked cakes, frosting cakes, etc. As of June 30, 2020, it operated through four tea shops, including two flagship and two general stores in the Hunan province, the People's Republic of China. The company is headquartered in Changsha, the People's Republic of China.

WNW.summary: Wunong Net Technology Company Limited, a holding company, through its subsidiary Wunong Technology (Shenzhen) Co., Ltd offers online retail of foods products in China. It primarily sells green food, organic food, intangible cultural heritage food, agricultural products, and pollution-free products. The company sells food products through its online retail store. It also operates a restaurant under the Wunong Food Hall name. Wunong Net Technology Company Limited was formerly known as Advancement International Limited and changed its name to Wunong Net Technology Company Limited in August 2019. Wunong Net Technology Company Limited was incorporated in 2018 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, the People's Republic of China.

XIAXF.long_name: Xiabuxiabu Catering Management (China) Holdings Co., Ltd.
XIAXF.summary: Xiabuxiabu Catering Management (China) Holdings Co., Ltd., an investment holding company, operates Chinese hotpot restaurants in the People's Republic of China. As of December 31, 2020, the company owned and operated 1,061 restaurants under the Xiabuxiabu brand name in 130 cities in approximately 24 provinces and three centrally administered municipalities; and 140 restaurants under the Coucou brand name in Beijing, Tianjin, Shanghai, and Hong Kong. It also offers catering services; and sells condiment products and other goods. In addition, the company engages in the slaughtering, processing, cold storage, and sale of raw materials. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Beijing, the People's Republic of China. Xiabuxiabu Catering Management (China) Holdings Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Ying Qi Investments Limited.

YUMC.MX.summary: Yum China Holdings, Inc. owns, operates, and franchises restaurants in China. The company operates through two segments, KFC and Pizza Hut. It operates restaurants under the KFC, Pizza Hut, Little Sheep, Huang Ji Huang, COFFii & JOY, East Dawning, Taco Bell, and Lavazza brands, which specialize in chicken, pizza, hot pot cooking, Chinese food, Mexican-style food, specialty coffee, simmer pot, and Italian coffee categories. The company also provides online food delivery services. In addition, it operates franchise restaurants under the KFC, Pizza Hut, Huang Ji Huang, Taco Bell, Little Sheep, East Dawning, Lavazza, and COFFii & JOY names. As of December 31, 2020, the company operated 10,506 restaurants in approximately 1,500 cities. Yum China Holdings, Inc. was incorporated in 2016 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.
